attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an invasion of privacy to the max this country is now turning into a police state the idea of indaviduals being allowed to enter your home and if required to take photographic eveidence of your home to determain how much council tax you have to pay or recieve a 1000£ fine

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
